meanings.definition: A small piece or portion of food
meanings.sent1: She savored every morceau of the delicious cake.
meanings.sent2: The chef served a delightful morceau of cheese on crackers.
meanings.sent3: He pretended to be full but couldn't resist one more morceau of chocolate.
meanings.sent4: The secret ingredient added a special morceau of flavor to the soup.
meanings.sent5: The tiny morceau of strawberry on top made the dessert irresistible.

meanings.definition: A short musical composition or piece of music
meanings.sent1: The pianist played a beautiful morceau at the concert.
meanings.sent2: She composed a lovely morceau for the school orchestra.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to dance to the morceau playing on the radio.
meanings.sent4: The morceau of music filled the room with joy and melody.
meanings.sent5: The haunting morceau echoed through the empty hallways.
